CustomField.description: Determines if account and associated contacts are a customer based on at least 1 active access code, status active, and bill account is true
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( Active_Access_Codes__c > 0, Active_FoxDen_Users__c > 0 ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Active'), Bill_Account__c = TRUE), TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Updates nightly based on account have 1+ active access code, status of active and bill account is true.
CustomField.label: Is Customer?
